title: Firefighters Rescue Parrots After Hearing Their Cries For Help
teaser: Firefighters in Middleton, Idaho, heard cries from a burning house â€” cries they thought were people trapped inside. Luckily for the parrots, they had been trained to cry for help in an emergency.
